hindi:
अति का भला न बोलना, अति की भली न चूप।
अति का भला न बरसना, अति की भली न धूप।
english:
Ati ka bhala na bolna, ati ki bhali na chup.
Ati ka bhala na barsana, ati ki bhali na dhoop.
translation: Neither excess of speaking is good, nor is excess of silence. Neither is excess of rain, nor is excess of sun.
